name: Global Business Promotions
slogan: Connecting Leaders WorldWide & Designing Event Apps
description:
Our Events gather leading executives in the field of science and technology.

Our apps are uniquely created to make peoples lives richer.

team.name: Salah Nasri
team.bioHtml: Founder @Global Business Promotions • Worked at @McKinsey & Co, @Gartner

jobs.title: 2D Animator
jobs.description:
You will be assigned to create a story board based on a script on a daily basis. 1 story a day is the KPI.
You are welcome to work anywhere around the world. 
On a daily basis you will receive a script and you will project manage each script from beginning to execution stage.
